Document.Focus: Hip or knee replacement - before - what to ask your doctor

Synonyms.Synonym: What to ask your doctor before hip or knee replacement
Hip replacement - before - what to ask your doctor
Knee replacement - before - what to ask your doctor
Hip arthroplasty - before - what to ask your doctor
Knee arthroplasty - before - what to ask your doctor

QAPair.Question: What is (are) Hip or knee replacement - before - what to ask your doctor ?
QAPair.Answer: You are going to have a hip or knee joint replacement surgery to replace all or part of your hip or knee joint with an artificial device (a prosthesis). Below are some questions you may want to ask your health care provider to help you prepare for your hip or knee replacement.
